PREPPhrase:
identify with 认同
identify oneself as 认为自已是...
recognize sth. as... 承认某事物为...
beyond/out of recognition 面目全非
on the spot 立即

distinguish between...and... 区别...与...
distinguish from... 区别...与...
distinguish oneself 使杰出

discriminate between...and... 区别...与...
discriminate...from... 把...从...中区别出来

in sequence 按顺序
keep...in sequence 按顺序排列...

chain sb./sth. to... 把某人/某物拴在...上
chain...up 把...栓起来
...remains to be done ...有待于被做

fade away 主键消失
fade in 画面淡入
fade out 画面淡出

keep/lose one's balance 保持/失去平衡
in the balance 前途不明朗

by all means 无论如何
be means of 以...方法
by no means 一点也不
approach to... ...的方式

it's good/bad manner to do sth 做某事有/没有礼貌
in a manner of speaking 从某种意义上
all manner of 各种各样的

a fresh start 重新开始
fresh from sth. 刚完成学业
comment on 评论
remark on/upon 谈论
be abundant in... ...丰富

in plenty 充裕的
plenty of 大量

in excess of 超过
to excess 过分

elect sb. as+职位 推选某人为...
elect sb. to+职位 推选某人担任...
respond to sth. 对某事/物 做出回答或反应
replay to 回应

in broad daylight 在光天化日之下
broad hint 明确的暗示

at home and abroad 国内外
from abroad 从国外来
go abroad 出国

above board 光明正大的
across the board 包括一切
board up 用木板封闭
on board 在船/车/飞机上
do battle with sb. about sth. 为某事与某人激烈斗争
struggle against 同...斗争
campaign for/against 发起运动支持
combine sth. with... 把某物与...联合起来

integrate A and B
integrate A with B
将A于B结合构成整体

...deserves doing
deserves to be done ...应当被做
